name: fabulous

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: blasmt
variants.description: use multi-threaded blas and lapack kernels

description:
FABuLOuS (Fast Accurate Block Linear krylOv Solver) Library implementing
Block-GMres with Inexact Breakdown and Deflated Restarting

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Automatically Tuned Linear Algebra Software, generic shared ATLAS is an
approach for the automatic generation and optimization of numerical
software. Currently ATLAS supplies optimized versions for the complete
set of linear algebra kernels known as the Basic Linear Algebra
Subroutines (BLAS), and a subset of the linear algebra routines in the
LAPACK library.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
NVPL LAPACK (NVIDIA Performance Libraries LAPACK) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 90 LAPACK APIs.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependent_to.name: maphyspp
dependent_to.description: a Massively Parallel Hybrid Solver in C++
